message.content:
1. The study aims to assess the effect of group Cognitive Processing Therapy (CPT) on stigma.
2. The study also aims to determine if stigma moderates the effectiveness of CPT.
3. The study is focused on treating mental health problems.
4. The subjects of the study are survivors of sexual violence.
5. The study is conducted in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

messages.content:
Statement: We sought to assess the effect of group Cognitive Processing Therapy (CPT) on stigma and the extent to which stigma might moderate the effectiveness of CPT in treating mental health problems among survivors of sexual violence in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
